name: examples-aws-lambda
description: Passkit-generator examples for running in AWS Lambda
author: Alexander P. Cerutti <cerutti.alexander@gmail.com>

scripts.preinstall: npm run clear:deps && npm unlink --no-save passkit-generator
scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix ../.. run build && npm --prefix ../.. link && npm link passkit-generator
scripts.run-offline: npx serverless offline --host 0.0.0.0; :'specifying host due to WSL limits'
